body.bibl: Er, Saliba. “Commemoration of the Departed in the Eucharist According to Jacob of Serugh (d. 522), Jacob of Edessa (d. 708) and Moses Bar Kepho (d. 903).” In Syrische Studien: Beiträge Zum 8.
